entries.name: new(path, password_hash: nil)
entries.desc: Open a password database at path

entries.name: delete_passwd(realm, user)
entries.desc: Removes a password from the database for user in realm.

entries.name: flush(output=nil)
entries.desc: Flush the password database.  If output is given the database will be written there instead of to the original path.

entries.name: get_passwd(realm, user, reload_db)
entries.desc: Retrieves a password from the database for user in realm.  If reload_db is true the database will be reloaded first.

entries.name: set_passwd(realm, user, pass)
entries.desc: Sets a password in the database for user in realm to pass.
